metadata.title: CVE-2016-3116 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: CRLF injection vulnerability in Dropbear SSH before 2016.72 allows remoteauthenticated users to bypass intended shell-command restrictions viacrafted X11 forwarding data.

criterions.comment: dropbear: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
